Reviews.Title: Nikon D5200 camera + 18-140 lense but no lens hood.
Reviews.Author: Cruizer
Reviews.Content: Everything was fine, except the lens did not come with a lens hood.  This is the first time I have every purchased a SLR or DSLR lens that did not come with a lens hood.

ProductInfo.Features:
D5200 DX-Format Digital SLR Camera Body with 3" Vari-Angle LCD
18-140mm f/3.5-5.6G ED AF-S VR DX Nikkor Lens
Compact Deluxe Gadget Bag, Tri-fold 3 Card Memory Card Wallet
Hi-Speed SD USB 2.0 Card Reader, 59" Full Size Photo/Video Tripod
Professional Dust Blower, 3 Pack LCD Screen Protectors, 3pc. Lens Cleaning Kit
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D5200 DX-Format Digital SLR Camera Body 18-140mm Lens Kit - Includes camera, 18-140mm f/3.5-5.6G ED AF-S VR DX Nikkor Lens, Gadget Bag, 3 Card Memory Card Wallet, SD USB Card Reader, 59" Tripod, and more.
